Cards.Description: Simple, really. Just cure cancer, how hard can it be?

Cards.Content: Establish connection to the provider’s API
Cards.Description: We’re connecting to a new REST API.

Cards.Content: Your client wants an oven that shops and cooks on its own
Cards.Description: Creating a robot that can move, has artificial intelligence, can shop (knows ingredients..so internet connection), has limbs that can get food prepared, and the normal oven operations: heat and cooking

Cards.Content: Add a new halloween themed photo effect.
Cards.Description: Halloween is approaching. A new halloween themed photo effect would be really nice to get users motivated to use our photo app.
